sentences.en: A very clingy child can drive a parent to distraction.
sentences.cn: 依赖性太强的孩子会逼得父母心烦意乱。
玩世不恭的态度是修不起铁路来的.

sentences.en: he was driven to distraction by the pain in his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 肩膀上的痛令他备受困扰。

sentences.en: He was not bored, he had no desire for conversation or distraction.
sentences.cn: 他并不是感到厌倦, 他只是不想说话或者别的.
海丽娜疯狂地爱着狄米特律斯.

sentences.en: His questions drove me to distraction.
sentences.cn: 他的(种种)问题使我心烦.

sentences.en: I feel this is getting to be a distraction from what I really want to do.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这开始让我无法集中精神做我真正想做的事情了。

sentences.en: I study in the library as there are too many distractions at home.
sentences.cn: 我在图书馆学习，家里分心的事太多。

sentences.en: In a word, Sophia was in love with him to distraction.
sentences.cn: 简单一句话, 苏菲亚爱他爱得神魂颠倒了.

sentences.en: Let's invite her to the disco — she needs distraction.
sentences.cn: 我们请她去迪斯科舞会 吧,她需要散散心.

sentences.en: The child will drive me to distraction.
sentences.cn: 这孩子闹得简直要使我发狂.

sentences.en: The child's continual crying drove me to distraction.
sentences.cn: 那孩子不断的哭声弄得我几乎要发疯.

sentences.en: Their national distraction is going to the disco.
sentences.cn: 他们的全民消遣就是去蹦迪。

sentences.en: When the distraction of the tongue is removed, the heart listens.
sentences.cn: 舌头只会让人分心,只有舌头停止说话, 心灵才能听见另一颗心声.

sentences.en: You could see him now, in this deluge of distraction.
sentences.cn: 现在你在这混乱的暴雨中,能够看见他.

sentences.en: You'll drive me to distraction with your silly questions!
sentences.cn: 你的那些傻问题简直要我的命!

words.tran_cn: 心烦意乱的；思想不集中的
注意力分散；消遣；心烦意乱

trans.tran_cn: 使人分心的事，娱乐，消遣
trans.tran_en: something that stops you paying attention to what you are doing
